Title: The Last Kiss
Writer: Paul Haggis (screenplay), Gabriele Muccino (motion picture "L'ultimo bacio")
Actors: Zach Braff, Jacinda Barrett, Casey Affleck, Rachel Bilson
Plot: Michael'd have a great job, still have his 4 best friends, and be in love with a beautiful girl at 30. He loves Jenna but his life seems predictable until he meets a college girl. It seems that everybody's having relationship problems.
